theorem.name: add_inductive_clause

text.english: Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{add}\): \[ \forall n,m \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(S(n), m) = S(\texttt{add}(n, m)) \]
text.italiano: Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{add}\): \[ \forall n,m \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(S(n), m) = S(\texttt{add}(n, m)) \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem add_inductive_clause: forall n m : nterm , add (S n) m = S (add n m).
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
